name: Greening
description: A Neon Polygons game This game was made during the MothoGlacia Construct Reddit GameJam. The theme was Organic and the limitation was Combat. Greening In this game, you need to defeat the terrible fire that despises the green of this world. With the help of your water cannon, try to extinguish him! However, you also need to use your water to spread life, as if there is no more green, the fire ends up winning.
